Posts.Content: Hi Lindsey, I too take co codamol and zopiclone, the zopiclone does not always do the job but helps, also be aware co codamol and chemo can make you very constipated I take senna and lactulose to combat that, last chemo on wed hooray although onc wanted to reduce the strength this time so hope I will be OK after digging my heels in and said no. Wishing you well on this long journey, gillian
